title: Strange Subtle Occurrences Keep Happening, And I'm Losing My Sanity
body:
Hi. To start this off I really don't know what I'm doing. I don't use Reddit, as my older brother simply lent me an old account of his to allow me to write this. I have heard of this forum before through the internet grape-vine, but never actually read any of it's content, but I am aware of the authenticity of some of it's stories..being fake; or so I've heard.

However I can assure you this ongoing saga of my life is real. And I need advice and guidance.

As the title suggests, I truly believe I am being stalked/followed by somebody, or I'm suffering from some utterly baffling case of memory loss where I'll commit one of the strange occurrences and then forget it. Like I said I'm so fucking confused and scared of what could very well be myself.

Let me start with the notes.

It's like some fucked up case of on the time clockwork. For three straight Friday's, between when I would wake up and before I went to work at my retail job in my city, I'd find a short, single sentence note either hanging by a magnet on the fridge, or simply strewn onto the table.

Said notes are, as previously stated, a single sentence, if that.

The first few weeks of the notes appearing, I shrugged it off as a friend messing with me, as I often have friends over on the weekends, or simply something I was doing in a sleepy state at night.

However as three weeks of me discovering these notes passed, on maybe the fourth morning after they must have been written, a night in which I had come home alone, nobody else at my residence, I still found a note.

I was now thoroughly creeped out and disturbed. I had forgotten what the first three notes said, simply short phrases, however this one I snapped a photo of, which I'll show here now:

https://imgur.com/a/u8m4DbA

I don't have children, and I live alone. I'm a 19 year old girl and am single, and have no enemies that I'm aware of. Something like this scares me and is giving me the chills again just thinking about it. At first I thought logically, wondering if one of my friends had left it over.

But like I said, it was just me that night, unlike the previous three notes I mentioned.

Strangely enough, the notes stopped for a two weeks period after finally snapping a photo of one of them rather then passing it off as a joke.

I was a bit on edge for those two weeks, and was constantly looking over my shoulder, and even a couple times asked my friends if I had a secret admirer or something, still attempting to make sense of it.

That brings me to the next event, and the one that has me questioning my sanity.

When I woke up a few days prior to writing this, Thursday morning of last week, I discovered my kitchen/dining room table had been set for what appeared to be a meal for two. Plates, knives, forks, and glasses; all empty, but set nice and straight as if I was expecting company.

I wasn't. And once again it had been just me at my house the night before I discovered this. I couldn't put logic into this one whatsoever.

I didn't do this.

As much as the picture fucks with my head, I did snap one of the meal setting as well:

https://imgur.com/a/crASpsg

Once again, I live completely alone. And if it matters, I am totally healthy physically and mentally, and I have no mental disorders.

I just don't understand this. It makes no sense to me.

After the dinner plate incident, I began to notice small inconsistencies in my apartment.

Doors being open after I swore I had shut them. Food that I'm confident I hadn't eaten, suddenly being gone.

A thought I had yesterday was that possibly a squatter was residing in my apartment.

I checked each room, each nook and cranny, and came up empty handed. I even had the assistance of my best friend, who I simply lied to and said I was searching for a phone charger.

The thing that has been bothering me today is the doors.

I ALWAYS shut my doors. I have just four of them in a short hallway inside my apartment, and despite constant attempts to close them and even double check before I leave the house or anything, I always find them open, even if I turn my back for mere seconds. Here's a picture of the four doors I'm talking about:

https://imgur.com/a/oG7B8wL

Today however, is what has pushed me over the edge. I left my apartment for an hour or two to go to coffee with my best friend, and when I returned home, I found a variety of things.

My TV was totally messed up and glitching as if it had been punched or something, two of the hallway doors were open, the kitchen cabinet was open about halfway; and the icing on the cake, my bed covers were undone.

You probably think I'm fucking insane. I wasn't, but I'm starting to feel that way. Nothing from my apartment was stolen, nothing was severely out of place.

Just subtle inconsistencies. Every wanning fucking minute of every day and it's driving me fucking insane.

This may have gotten off topic. I don't know. Here's a picture of my TV with the static, as well as my undone bed:

https://imgur.com/a/gVKAwEE

I always make my bed, and this is really getting to me. The opposites of my normal routines keep happening. I don't get it. I really need answers. What should I do?

This isn't a normal post from what I'm sure you're used to, but it's what's happening. I ask for some advice.

I think I really need it.
author: xxMayim_Bialikxx
